name: Grilled Pork Chops With Blueberry Salsa
keywords: blueberries, jalapeño, pork, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/2 medium red onion, peeled and diced small
1 red bell pepper, cored, deribbed and diced

recipeInstructions.text: To make the salsa, coarsely chop 1 1/2 cups of the blueberries. In a bowl, combine the chopped and whole berries and the remaining salsa ingredients. Let stand for 1 hour.

To make the pork, prepare a charcoal grill. When the coals are hot, grill the chops until just cooked through, about 8 minutes per side. Season with salt and pepper. Divide among 4 plates and top with the salsa. Serve immediately.
